All Classes

Class Description
AdditiveUtility2D
This class represent the function used in section two of the thesis
U(ct, cT) = u(ct) + vT(cT)
BinarySearchFinder
Root finder for utility function.
CobbDouglas1D
This class represent the famous CD production function:
p(k) = b * kα
DiscountFunction
Discount function to be specified by implementing classes
ExponentialDiscounting
Class representing the usual discounting mechanism
df(t, r) = e-rt
InvestmentFunction
This function is intended to represent a map from consumption level to wealth
LinearInvestment
Represent the mapping:
p(w - ct)
MultidimensionalUtilityFunction
This interface is intended to be implemented by classes representing different utility functions:
U(c1, ..., cn)
OptimalFinder
Represent mathematical tool to find optimal consumption allocation
OptimalPoint
Experiment-Class.
PowerUtilityFunction
This class represent the famous 1D power utility function:
u(c) = c1 - γ / 1-γ
ProductionFunction
This interface is intended to represent functions which allow the agents to transfer their wealth:
p : w → c T
TenorDiscretization
This interface is intend to store as doubles the subdivision of the time interval [t, T] in n periods.
TenorFromArray
Class representing TenorDiscretization starting from an array of double
TenorFromTimes  
UtilityFunction
This interface is intended to be implemented by classes representing different utility functions:
u(c)
